title: Rhubarb sponge cake with crumble topping
ingredients: ['4 to 5 sticks of rhubarb', '1 to 2 tablespoons granulated sugar', '250g plain flour', '2 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '200g caster sugar', '125ml vegetable or sunflower oil', '125ml milk', '2 eggs', 'Crumble topping', '6 tablespoons plain flour', '4 tablespoons sugar', '4 tablespoons butter']
